Articles.Content:
I've had this problem were the stock RCS has gone missing. Most of my ships used them so now I have only a few of them still working. I have some mods installed, but I do not know which one is causing that. Any help is appreciated.
mods list:

[x] Science! Continued (xScienceContinued 6.0.0.9)
Advanced Jet Engine (AdvancedJetEngine v2.20.0)
AJE Extended (AJEExtendedConfigs 2:v2.0.5)
ASET Agency (ASETAgency 1.0)
ASET Props (ASETProps 1.5)
B9 Aerospace Procedural Wings - Fork (B9-PWings-Fork 3:0.43.0.10)

BetterTimeWarpContinued (BetterTimeWarpCont 2.3.13)
ClickThrough Blocker (ClickThroughBlocker 1:0.1.10.17)
CommNet Relays (ContractConfigurator-CommNetRelays v2.1.0)

Harmony 2 (Harmony2 2.0.4.0)
Kerbal Actuators (KerbalActuators v1.8.4)
Kerbal Engineer Redux (KerbalEngineerRedux 1.1.9.0)
Kerbal Joint Reinforcement Continued (KerbalJointReinforcementContinued v3.6.1)
Kopernicus Planetary System Modifier (Kopernicus 2:release-1.12.1-87)
KSC Switcher (KSCSwitcher v2.0.0.0)
KSP Community Fixes (KSPCommunityFixes 1.10.1)
KSPBurst (KSPBurst v1.5.5.1)
MechJeb 2 (MechJeb2 2.14.1.0)
ModularFlightIntegrator (ModularFlightIntegrator 1.2.10.0)
Module Manager (ModuleManager 4.2.1)
Near Future Aeronautics (NearFutureAeronautics 2.1.1)
Near Future Electrical (NearFutureElectrical 1.2.3)
Near Future Electrical Core (NearFutureElectrical-Core 1.2.3)
Near Future Exploration (NearFutureExploration 1.1.2)
Near Future IVA Props (NearFutureProps 1:0.7.1)
Near Future Launch Vehicles (NearFutureLaunchVehicles 2.2.0)
Near Future Propulsion (NearFuturePropulsion 1.3.5)
Near Future Solar (NearFutureSolar 1.3.2)
Near Future Solar Core (NearFutureSolar-Core 1.3.2)
Near Future Spacecraft (NearFutureSpacecraft 1.4.3)
Precise Node (PreciseNode 1.2.11.3)
Procedural Fairings (ProceduralFairings 1:v6.2)
Procedural Parts (ProceduralParts v2.3.0)
RasterPropMonitor (RasterPropMonitor 1:v0.31.6)
RasterPropMonitor Core (RasterPropMonitor-Core 1:v0.31.6)
RCS Build Aid (RCSBuildAid v1.0.6)
Real Antennas (RealAntennas v2.1.1)
Real Fuels (RealFuels 1:rf-v13.7.0)
Real Plume (RealPlume 2:v13.3.2)

@GABRIEU222"gone missing": Please clarify whether the parts vanished off ships in flight, the parts are missing from the VAB part menu, or the parts are still there but don't provide thrust?

Have you made any mod changes recently? Realism Overhaul and Real Fuels change fuel types and I don't know what happens if you add those mods in the middle of a saved game. Try right-click on your RCS tanks and RCS thrusters to see if they are set to use the same fuel type.

If you don't find anything obvious, share your log file. Directions at the link below.
